SMAP-SPL3SMP.description: This Level-3 soil moisture product provides a composite of daily estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by the SMAP passive microwave radiometer.

SMAP-SPL3SMP_E.description: This enhanced Level-3 soil moisture product provides a composite of daily estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by the Soil Moisture Active Passive radiometer.

SMAP-SPL4SMGP.description: This SMAP Level-4 soil moisture data includes the following parameters: surface soil moisture, root zone soil moisture and additional research products (not validated).

SMAP-NSIDC-0738.description: This data set contains twice-daily, enhanced-resolution brightness temperature data derived from the SMAP radiometer.

SMAP-SPL1BTB.description: This Level-1B product provides calibrated estimates of time-ordered geolocated brightness temperatures measured by the Soil Moisture Active Passive passive microwave radiometer.

SMAP-SPL1CTB.description: This Level-1C product contains calibrated and geolocated brightness temperatures acquired by the Soil Moisture Active Passive radiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending and 6:00 p.m. ascending half-orbit passes.

SMAP-SPL1CTB_E.description: This enhanced Level-1C product contains calibrated and geolocated brightness temperatures acquired by the Soil Moisture Active Passive radiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending and 6:00 p.m. ascending half-orbit passes.

SMAP-SPL2SMA.description: This Level-2 soil moisture product provides estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by the SMAP active radar during 6:00 a.m. descending half-orbit passes, as well as ancillary data such as surface temperature and vegetation water content.

SMAP-SPL2SMAP.description: This Level-2 soil moisture product provides estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by both the Soil Moisture Active Passive radar and radiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending half-orbit passes.

SMAP-SPL2SMAP_S.description: This Level-2 soil moisture product provides estimates of land surface conditions retrieved by both the Soil Moisture Active Passiveadiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending and 6:00 p.m. ascending half-orbit passes and the Sentinel-1A and -1B radar.
SMAP-SPL2SMAP_S.spatialCoverage: AFRICA, ASIA, EUROPE, NORTH AMERICA, SOUTH AMERICA, OCEANIA

SMAP-SPL2SMP.description: This Level-2 soil moisture product provides estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by the Soil Moisture Active Passive passive microwave radiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending and 6:00 p.m. ascending half-orbit passes.

SMAP-SPL2SMP_E.description: This enhanced Level-2 product contains calibrated, geolocated, brightness temperatures acquired by the Soil Moisture Active Passive radiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending and 6:00 p.m. ascending half-orbit passes.

SMAP-SPL3SMA.description: This Level-3 soil moisture product provides a composite of daily estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by the Soil Moisture Active Passive radar as well as a variety of ancillary data sources.

SMAP-SPL3SMAP.description: This Level-3 soil moisture product provides a daily composite of global land surface conditions retrieved by both the Soil Moisture Active Passive radar and radiometer.

SMAP-SPL4CMDL.description: The Level-4 carbon product provides global gridded daily estimates of net ecosystem carbon (CO2) exchange derived using a satellite data based terrestrial carbon flux model.

SMAP-SPL4SMAU.description: This SMAP Level-4 soil moisture data includes the following parameters: surface soil moisture, root zone soil moisture and additional research products (not validated).

SMAP-SPL4SMLM.description: This SMAP Level-4 soil moisture data includes the following parameters: surface soil moisture, root zone soil moisture and additional research products (not validated).

IceSAT-2-ATL08V3.description: This data set (ATL08) contains along-track heights above the WGS84 ellipsoid (ITRF2014 reference frame) for the ground and canopy surfaces.

IceSAT-2-ATL08V2.description: This data set (ATL08) contains along-track heights above the WGS84 ellipsoid (ITRF2014 reference frame) for the ground and canopy surfaces.

IceSAT-2-ATL13V3.description: This data set (ATL13) contains along-track water surface heights and descriptive statistics for inland water bodies. Water bodies include lakes, reservoirs, bays, and estuaries.

IceSAT-2-ATL13V2.description: This data set (ATL13) contains along-track water surface heights and descriptive statistics for inland water bodies. Water bodies include lakes, reservoirs, bays, and estuaries.

GEDI.description: The Global Ecosystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI) instrument aims to characterize ecosystem structure and dynamics to enable radically improved quantification and understanding of the Earthâ€™s carbon cycle and biodiversity.
